text: 34:25 Aisaia 11:6-9; Jeremaia 23:6; Hosea 2:18Me navir amɨrizimɨn ikɨ deragh dapiagh ikɨsɨ, kɨ me ko Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavim damuam. Me mɨsoghɨrarɨghamin asɨzir atiaba, kɨ bar ada gɨvagham, eghtɨ da ua men nguazimɨn ikian kogham. Guizbangɨra, nan sipsipba deravɨra ikɨva ruarir ekiabar dakuam.
